keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS

Class SSFileEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.UCS.SSFileEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment

    public class SSFileEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Environment

    This is the base class for all the single step problems environments that read the examples from a file. It uses the Dataset API to get all the information needed from the file.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle University Ramón Lull, Barcelona) 03/12/2008
